verses.verse: כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> If יִגְנֹֽב־ <S%H1589><s%> shall steal אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> If a man שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> an ox אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שֶׂ֔ה <S%H7716><s%> or a sheep וּטְבָח֖וֹ <S%H2873><s%> and kill א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מְכָר֑וֹ <S%H4376><s%> it or sell חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> five בָקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen יְשַׁלֵּם֙ <S%H7999><s%> it he shall restore תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash הַשּׁ֔וֹר <S%H7794><s%> for an ox וְאַרְבַּע־ <S%H702><s%> and four צֹ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash הַשֶּֽׂה׃ <S%H7716><s%> for a sheep

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בַּמַּחְתֶּ֛רֶת <S%H4290><s%> breaking up יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> be found הַגַּנָּ֖ב <S%H1590><s%> If a thief וְהֻכָּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> and be smitten וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> that he die אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there ל֖וֹ דָּמִֽים׃ <S%H1818><s%> [there shall] no blood

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if זָרְחָ֥ה <S%H2224><s%> be risen הַשֶּׁ֛מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> If the sun עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> on דָּמִ֣ים <S%H1818><s%> upon him [there shall be] blood ל֑וֹ שַׁלֵּ֣ם <S%H7999><s%> [shed] for him [for] he should make full יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <S%H7999><s%> restitution אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> nothing ל֔וֹ וְנִמְכַּ֖ר <S%H4376><s%> if he have nothing then he shall be sold בִּגְנֵבָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1591><s%> for his theft

אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> If הִמָּצֵא֩ <S%H4672><s%> be certainly תִמָּצֵ֨א <S%H4672><s%> found בְיָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand הַגְּנֵבָ֗ה <S%H1591><s%> If the theft מִשּׁ֧וֹר <S%H7794><s%> whether it be ox עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> or חֲמ֛וֹר <S%H2543><s%> or ass עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> or שֶׂ֖ה <S%H7716><s%> or sheep חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> alive שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> double יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> he shall restore ס

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> If יַבְעֶר־ <S%H1197><s%> to be eaten אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> If a man שָׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> shall cause a field אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or כֶ֔רֶם <S%H3754><s%> or vineyard וְשִׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> and shall put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> [בְּעִירָה כ] (בְּעִירֹ֔ו <S%H1165><s%> beast ק) וּבִעֵ֖ר <S%H1197><s%> and shall feed בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> field אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> in another man's מֵיטַ֥ב <S%H4315><s%> of the best שָׂדֵ֛הוּ <S%H7704><s%> of his own field וּמֵיטַ֥ב <S%H4315><s%> and of the best כַּרְמ֖וֹ <S%H3754><s%> of his own vineyard יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> shall he make restitution ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תֵצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> break out אֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> If fire וּמָצְאָ֤ה <S%H4672><s%> and catch קֹצִים֙ <S%H6975><s%> in thorns וְנֶאֱכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> be consumed גָּדִ֔ישׁ <S%H1430><s%> so that the stacks of corn א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or הַקָּמָ֖ה <S%H7054><s%> or the standing corn א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> or the field שַׁלֵּ֣ם <S%H7999><s%> shall surely יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <S%H7999><s%> make restitution הַמַּבְעִ֖ר <S%H1197><s%> [therewith] he that kindled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּעֵרָֽה׃ <S%H1200><s%> the fire ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> shall deliver אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <S%H7453><s%> unto his neighbour כֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or כֵלִים֙ <S%H3627><s%> or stuff לִשְׁמֹ֔ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep וְגֻנַּ֖ב <S%H1589><s%> and it be stolen מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הָאִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> out of the man's אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יִמָּצֵ֥א <S%H4672><s%> be found הַגַּנָּ֖ב <S%H1590><s%> if the thief יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> let him pay שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> double

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> be not יִמָּצֵא֙ <S%H4672><s%> found הַגַּנָּ֔ב <S%H1590><s%> If the thief וְנִקְרַ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> shall be brought בַּֽעַל־ <S%H1167><s%> then the master הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> unto the judges אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁלַ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> [to see] whether he have put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בִּמְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> goods רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> unto his neighbour's

עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> For כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> For all manner פֶּ֡שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> of trespass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for שׁ֡וֹר <S%H7794><s%> [whether it be] for ox עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for חֲ֠מוֹר <S%H2543><s%> for ass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for שֶׂ֨ה <S%H7716><s%> for sheep עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for שַׂלְמָ֜ה <S%H8008><s%> for raiment עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אֲבֵדָ֗ה <S%H9><s%> [or] for any manner of lost thing אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which יֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> which [another] challengeth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he זֶ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> This עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> before הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> before the judges יָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> shall come דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> to be his the cause שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8147><s%> of both parties אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom יַרְשִׁיעֻן֙ <S%H7561><s%> shall condemn אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> [and] whom the judges יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> he shall pay שְׁנַ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> double לְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> unto his neighbour ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִתֵּן֩ <S%H5414><s%> deliver אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֜הוּ <S%H7453><s%> unto his neighbour חֲמ֨וֹר <S%H2543><s%> an ass אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> or an ox אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שֶׂ֛ה <S%H7716><s%> or a sheep וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> or any beast לִשְׁמֹ֑ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep וּמֵ֛ת <S%H4191><s%> and it die אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or נִשְׁבַּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> or be hurt אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <S%H7617><s%> or driven away אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no רֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> no man seeing

שְׁבֻעַ֣ת <S%H7621><s%> [Then] shall an oath יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תִּהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall be made בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> by שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8147><s%> be between them both אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has not שָׁלַ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> that he hath not put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בִּמְלֶ֣אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> goods רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> unto his neighbour's וְלָקַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> of it shall accept בְּעָלָ֖יו <S%H1167><s%> and the owner וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> [thereof] and he shall not make [it] good

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if גָּנֹ֥ב <S%H1589><s%> is actually יִגָּנֵ֖ב <S%H1589><s%> stolen מֵעִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with יְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> from him he shall make restitution לִבְעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H1167><s%> unto the owner

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If טָרֹ֥ף <S%H2963><s%> torn יִטָּרֵ֖ף <S%H2963><s%> to pieces יְבִאֵ֣הוּ <S%H935><s%> [then] let him bring עֵ֑ד <S%H5707><s%> it [for] witness הַטְּרֵפָ֖ה <S%H2966><s%> that which was torn לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> [and] he shall not make good פ

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִשְׁאַ֥ל <S%H7592><s%> borrow אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> thereof [being] not with it רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> [ought] of his neighbour וְנִשְׁבַּ֣ר <S%H7665><s%> and it be hurt אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or מֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> or die בְּעָלָ֥יו <S%H1167><s%> the owner אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> else עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with שַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> he shall surely יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> make [it] good

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If בְּעָלָ֥יו <S%H1167><s%> [But] if the owner עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> thereof [be] with it he shall not make [it] good אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׂכִ֣יר <S%H7916><s%> if it [be] an hired ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> it בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> [thing] it came בִּשְׂכָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H7939><s%> for his hire ס

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יְפַתֶּ֣ה <S%H6601><s%> entice אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man בְּתוּלָ֛ה <S%H1330><s%> a maid אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not אֹרָ֖שָׂה <S%H781><s%> that is not betrothed וְשָׁכַ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> and lie עִמָּ֑הּ <S%H5973><s%> must מָהֹ֛ר <S%H4117><s%> with her he shall surely יִמְהָרֶ֥נָּה <S%H4117><s%> endow לּ֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> her to be his wife

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If מָאֵ֧ן <S%H3985><s%> utterly יְמָאֵ֛ן <S%H3985><s%> refuse אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> If her father לְתִתָּ֣הּ <S%H5414><s%> to give ל֑וֹ כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money יִשְׁקֹ֔ל <S%H8254><s%> her unto him he shall pay כְּמֹ֖הַר <S%H4119><s%> according to the dowry הַבְּתוּלֹֽת׃ <S%H1330><s%> of virgins ס
מְכַשֵּׁפָ֖ה <S%H3784><s%> Thou shalt not suffer a witch לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תְחַיֶּֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> to live ס
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Whoever שֹׁכֵ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> Whosoever lieth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> with a beast מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death ס

זֹבֵ֥חַ <S%H2076><s%> He that sacrificeth לָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> unto [any] god יָֽחֳרָ֑ם <S%H2763><s%> only he shall be utterly destroyed בִּלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> save לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H905><s%> alone

וְגֵ֥ר <S%H1616><s%> a stranger לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תוֹנֶ֖ה <S%H3238><s%> Thou shalt neither vex וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or תִלְחָצֶ֑נּוּ <S%H3905><s%> nor oppress כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גֵרִ֥ים <S%H1616><s%> him for ye were strangers הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> become בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אַלְמָנָ֥ה <S%H490><s%> any widow וְיָת֖וֹם <S%H3490><s%> or fatherless child לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְעַנּֽוּן׃ <S%H6031><s%> Ye shall not afflict

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עַנֵּ֥ה <S%H6031><s%> thou afflict תְעַנֶּ֖ה <S%H6031><s%> them in any wise אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if צָעֹ֤ק <S%H6817><s%> and they cry יִצְעַק֙ <S%H6817><s%> at all אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to שָׁמֹ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> unto me I will surely אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> hear צַעֲקָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6818><s%> their cry

וְחָרָ֣ה <S%H2734><s%> shall wax hot אַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> And my wrath וְהָרַגְתִּ֥י <S%H2026><s%> and I will kill אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בֶּחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> you with the sword וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall become נְשֵׁיכֶם֙ <S%H802><s%> and your wives אַלְמָנ֔וֹת <S%H490><s%> shall be widows וּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> and your children יְתֹמִֽים׃ <S%H3490><s%> fatherless פ
